system.description:
You have dedicated yourself to an ideal and have also made a bargain for eldritch power. This may be a severe conflict of interest or the terms of your pact and the tenets of your ideal may exist in harmony. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • You may change your warlock spellcasting ability to Charisma if you desire. Once made, this choice is permanent.

  • You gain the following feature: @UUID[Item.8FxQv5UnfteaAmr0]{Challenging Curse}.

source.name: Thematic Toolkit: Judge, Jury, and Executioner

system.prerequisite: 3 levels in herald, 3 levels in warlock
